summary: The diff updates email text on ContactPage to "SankalpHubsolutions@gmail.com", but there is no evidence that all other frontend email occurrences (e.g., Footer/About/other pages/components) were found and replaced. The diff also includes modifications to non-UI metadata/summary files that were not requested and go beyond "only update email-address text".

missing_requirements.requirement: Search the entire frontend project for any existing email address text and replace every occurrence with exactly: SankalpHubsolutions@gmail.com (without changing anything else).
missing_requirements.reason: Only ContactPage.tsx shows email updates in the provided diff; there is no evidence of a project-wide replacement across other likely locations mentioned in the requirement (Footer, About page, etc.) or other components/pages.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is strictly about replacing displayed email-address text site-wide; changing project state/summary metadata is not requested and is outside the allowed scope.
BuildRequest does not ask for regenerating/updating file summaries; scope is limited to replacing email-address text in the frontend UI content.
